00008 ConnectorListener::ExtendedMessageForService::ExtendedMessageForService(Message& ToCopy)
00009 {
00010     buffer                      = ToCopy.GetBuffer();
00011     len                         = ToCopy.GetLength();
00012     mid                         = ToCopy.GetMsgId();
00013     OriginalSize        = 0;
00014     origine                     = ToCopy.GetOrigine();
00015     pid                         = ToCopy.GetPeerId();
00016     realBuffer          = (char*)NULL;
00017 }
00018
00019 ConnectorListener::ExtendedMessageForService::~ExtendedMessageForService()
00020 {
00021     // To prevent multiple free of buffer, enpty myself
00022     buffer                      = (char*)NULL;
00023     len                         = 0;
00024     mid                         = 0;
00025     origine                     = UnknownOrigine;
00026     pid                         = 0;
00027
00028     // Done in constructor
00029     OriginalSize        = 0;
00030     realBuffer          = (char*)NULL;
00031 }

00044 void ConnectorListener::Connected(Service& TheService, const SimpleString LocalConnectorName, unsigned int PeerId)
00045 {
00046     OmiscidTrace( "A new peer %8.8x connects to %s:%s.\n", PeerId, TheService.GetName().GetStr(), LocalConnectorName.GetStr() );
00047 }

00056 void ConnectorListener::Disconnected(Service& TheService, const SimpleString LocalConnectorName, unsigned int PeerId)
00057 {
00058     OmiscidTrace( "The peer %8.8x disconnects from %s:%s.\n", PeerId, TheService.GetName().GetStr(), LocalConnectorName.GetStr() );
00059 }

00071 }

00073 void ConnectorListener::Receive(MsgSocket& ConnectionPoint, MsgSocketCallBackData& CallbackData)
00074 {
00075     ExtendedMessageForService ExtMsg(CallbackData.Msg);
00076     ExtMsg.ReceivedFromConnector = ConnectionPoint.GetName();
00077
00078     // Call the User Friendly interface
00079     MessageReceived( *ServiceOfTheConnector, ConnectionPoint.GetName(), ExtMsg );
00080 }
00081
00082 void ConnectorListener::Connected(MsgSocket& ConnectionPoint, unsigned int PeerId)
00083 {
00084     Connected( *ServiceOfTheConnector, ConnectionPoint.GetName(), PeerId );
00085 }
00086
00087 void ConnectorListener::Disconnected(MsgSocket& ConnectionPoint, unsigned int PeerId)
00088 {
00089     Disconnected( *ServiceOfTheConnector, ConnectionPoint.GetName(), PeerId );
00090 }
